2004-05-14.snippet: Graydon Carter received a $100,000 payment from Universal Studios in 2003 for suggesting that the book "A Beautiful Mind" be made into a film....
2004-05-14.lead_paragraph: Graydon Carter received a $100,000 payment from Universal Studios in 2003 for suggesting that the book "A Beautiful Mind" be made into a film.

headline.main: Vanity Fair Editor Got $100,000 for Suggesting a Movie

byline.original: By DAVID CARR and SHARON WAXMAN
